    • Method Detail

      • findContours

        public java.util.LinkedList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> findContours(java.lang.String imgPathName,
                                                                     boolean displayResult)
                                                              throws java.io.IOException
        findContours finds and then draws the contours in a specified image. The image path name is assumed to be the absolute path name of the image. If the pathname is null, then the method will return null.
        Parameters:
        imgPathName - the absolute pathname of the image.
        displayResult - if the result wants to be displayed.
        Returns:
        the found list if contours.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • findContours

        public java.util.LinkedList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> findContours(boolean displayResult)
                                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Find contours using the image specified in the locator. If null, the method will return null.
        Parameters:
        displayResult - true will display the result of the locator.
        Returns:
        the found list of contours.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getContours

        public java.util.LinkedList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> getContours()
        Get the found list of contours.
        Returns:
        list of contours. Returns null if contours were never found.

      • setContours

        public void setContours(java.util.LinkedList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> contours)
        Set the found list of contours to a specific list of contours.
        Parameters:
        contours - LikedList of new contour values.

      • getDrawnContours

        public org.opencv.core.Mat getDrawnContours()

        Returns:
        image Matrix of drawn contours.

      • setDrawnContours

        public void setDrawnContours(org.opencv.core.Mat drawnContours)
        Sets the current image Matrix containing the image with drawn contours to a different image Matrix.
        Parameters:
        drawnContours - the drawn contours
